int sum ( int a [ 100 ] [ 100 ] , int i , int j , int n , int b [ 100 ] [ 100 ] ) { int s ; if ( i > n ) return 0 ; if ( b [ i ] [ j ] != 0 ) return b [ i ] [ j ] ; int s1 = sum ( a , i + 1 , j , n , b ) ; int s2 = sum ( a , i + 1 , j + 1 , n , b ) ; if ( s1 > s2 ) { s = s1 + a [ i ] [ j ] ; } else { s = s2 + a [ i ] [ j ] ; } b [ i ] [ j ] = s ; return s ; } int main ( ) { int a [ 100 ] [ 100 ] , n , i , j , no , t , b [ 100 ] [ 100 ] ; scanf ( "%d
" , & no ) ; for ( t = 0 ; t < no ; t ++ ) { scanf ( "%d
" , & n ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) { scanf ( "%d " , & a [ i ] [ j ] ) ; } scanf ( "
" ) ; } for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) { b [ i ] [ j ] = 0 ; } } int ans = sum ( a , 0 , 0 , n , b ) ; printf ( "%d
" , ans ) ; } return 0 ; }
